All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Controller
Controller class getting throw type from user by command line or GUI
Dice
Class representing a dice with given size (in this case it is a MVC Model)
DiceThrower
RPG DiceThrower is a simple Java program, that will return you an array of random number of numbers from given range in RPG friendly format (3K10, 2K5)
HandledException
Class responsible for handling exceptions in program
Model
Model class of MVC model responsible for throwing dice and returning results
View
Class representing application view
